entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
